LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.label: Recon Calibration
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.description: Share fire control data with friendly forces within range to improve squad shooting accuracy for a short time.
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.label: Precise Sniping
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.description: The Sniper uses its built-in ballistic computer to adjust for the conditions of its environment, greatly improving accuracy for a short time.
